name: Gamble Rumble
description:
Gamble Rumble is an action arena game where the player must kill all enemies.

It's an infinite wave game. Their is no end.

We hope you'll enjoy our game and every feedback are appreciated !

Have fun !

Commands

-> Movement : ZQSD or WASD

-> Player Attack: Left mouse click

-> Player Ultimate: Right mouse click (Player ultime gauge (blue gauge) must have green border)   

-> Show mouse to click on screen: Middle mouse click

========== Team ==========
